page.title: 05A Home In Congresbury
page.content: My home is quite small. It has three bedrooms, a dining room, a small room, a bathroom and a kitchen. It has a back garden with an old shed in it. It has a front garden with a drive running up the side of it. It has nine windows. We have been living here ever since I started school. Out of the window in the dining room you can see the motorway (M5), hedges, trees, fields and the odd house. Out of the kitchen window you can see hedges, trees and the river bank. Sometimes you can see boats going along the Bristol Channel. I have got two rabbits, a dog and a horse. I like living here. There is more room to play than in the town and space to walk the dog. Leighton McGuinness, St. Annes' School
